description:
Breakout Birdie will challenge your skill and reflexes to the max!

The aim is to bounce your Birdie around the screen as you attempt to bash all the blocks and destroy the pesky boss birds! Simply swipe to move the paddle and bounce the Birdie into the air. Catch golden power-ups to boost your abilities but avoid the red power-ups which will cause nothing but chaos!

FEATURES:
- A fantastically fun arcade game!
- Cool power-ups to enhance your abilities!
- 48 unique and challenging levels to unlock!
- Colorful cartoon characters and environments!
- Intuitive touch-screen controls!
- Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
- Bright and bubbly background tunes!
- Suitable for players of all ages!
name: Breakout Birdie
